wikipedia_page.main: Alan Roy Deakin (27 November 1941 – 2 January 2018) was an English footballer during the 1960s. He was the captain of Aston Villa and also played for Walsall. He is the younger brother of Mike Deakin who also played in the Football League, most notably for Crystal Palace.

response: Michael Raymond Frederick Deakin (25 October 1933 – 8 August 2017) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward. He made 204 appearances in the Football League, for Crystal Palace, Northampton Town and Aldershot scoring 92 goals. He was the older brother of Alan Deakin who also played in the Football League; most notably for Aston Villa.
* 2 January 2018: Alan Deakin, 76, Aston Villa and Walsall wing half.
